title: Remove the caffeine.ai footer credit from the end screen

requirements.text: Remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” footer/credit from the final end screen so the site appears fully handmade.
acceptanceCriteria: The EndScreen slide no longer renders any footer/credit section containing the text “Built with”, “caffeine.ai”, or a link to https://caffeine.ai/.
The end screen still shows the outcome emoji/message, optional heart row (for the 'ofc' path), the visual effects, and the “Start Over” button with unchanged behavior.
A user viewing the deployed app cannot see any “created by/built with caffeine.ai” branding anywhere on the end screen.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the backend as-is (single Motoko actor); no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new slides, changing the question/answer text, or altering the branching logic.
Changing the visual theme beyond what is necessary to remove the footer section.
